articles.description: TalkSPORT host Simon Jordan has labelled the Newcastle United dressing room a 'disgrace' and fears the players will lead to Steve Bruce getting the sack
articles.content:
Former Crystal Palace owner Simon Jordan has labelled Newcastle United's dressing room a 'disgrace' and believes the players will cost Steve Bruce his job.
The Magpies' winless run has now stretched… [+2656 chars]
